To make the sweet in the photo, you will need to mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, butter, and milk. Then, roll out the dough and cut it into circles. Fry the dough until golden brown and let cool. Finally, top with your favorite icing and sprinkles.

To make the sweet in the photo, you will need a donut, sprinkles, a chocolate muffin, a mini cupcake, and a fork. Start by heating the donut in the oven until it is golden brown. Then, sprinkle the sprinkles over the donut. Next, place the chocolate muffin on top of the donut. Finally, place the mini cupcake on top of the muffin and use the fork to press down lightly. Allow the sweet to cool before serving.
